title: 2018 का यह वीडियो भारत का है, पाकिस्तान का नहीं
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: J&K Police of Rajouri district managed to arrest main accused wanted in the case of merciless beating of mother – daughter duo, a video of which is also viral on social media from a hideout in Kathua in Mahreen tehsil of Police Station Raj Bagh during the mid- night of today . pic.twitter.com/pFgiF5B1lT
